title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) 
Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department agriculture food marine) order 2020

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Niall Goodwin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Niall Goodwin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed as 
Special Adviser to Martin Heydon, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine with effect from 2 November 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [733] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH
